title: How can I set the Y536A1 phone status bar not to display the remaining battery percentage?
answer:
Go to **Settings**, touch **Battery**, and clear the **Remaining battery percentage** check box.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141023050140983001.png)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141023050140936002.png)

                                       The figures are for your
reference only. The actual screens may vary.
